snippet: MULLEN--Thomas P.,63, passed away peacefully on February 1, 2016, at his home in New York City. He was Founder and Managing Partner of Park Li Group, a global strategic management consulting practice. He is survived by Nancy, his loving wife of 27 years; daughters Katie, of Brooklyn, and Samantha, of New York City; and brothers Doran, of New York City; Joseph and sister- in-law Nancy, of Franklin, MA; and Michael, of Sinking Spring, PA. Friends may call at the Perazzo Funeral Home, 199 Bleecker Street, New York, NY on Friday, February 5, from 2:00-5:00 and 7:00-9:00pm. In lieu of flowers, the family requests donations in memory of Thomas Mullen to the PMP Research Foundation, info@pmpcure. org. Online condolences may be made to perazzofuneral home.com. 1/3
